name: Sent Back
description:
Welcome to the demo for the game Sent Back where you play as adventurer Matthew Henson.  After running through the arctic environment  you here a crack beneath you and before you know it your in a whole new world. Talk and help people along your journeys.  This demo is to show the work on the game so far things will be changed in full release as well as more gameplay and mechanics.

Stay tuned for updates on Instagram or twitter under charles_da_III
